title: Is it possible if you leave/join a game late and your team still wins do you have to get banned?
body:
Well I was playing a game with my friend and I was going top hecriam against a riven, I had to leave for training and I told my friend to finish the game (which he did) and he said that I got dc'ed and it came up as you left the game. They won the game and I thought that my account can't get low priority. As I log in it came up as that I am in low priority that I left the game (which I understand) but the thing is that my team won and I have to be punished for that? This kinda gets my frustrated but I just want to ask to a riot employee is that do we have to get banned even though our team still won?

Cheers Rainer

replies.body:
A leave is still a leave. If they allowed something like this then consistent leavers will have less to fear, as they can say, "it's the team's fault for not winning, I don't deserve this punishment."

You should not play a game if you aren't 100% sure that you have at least one hour spare.
